content.text:
# Ali Baba and the Seven Dwarfs

}}
Ali Baba and the Seven Dwarfs () is a 2015 Turkish comedy action film written and directed by Cem Yılmaz, about two Turkish brothers-in-law who visit a gardening fair in Bulgaria to sell their garden gnomes and suddenly find themselves in the middle of a manhunt.
Cast
* Cem Yılmaz - Ali Şenay / Boris Mancov
* Irina Ivkina  - Veronica
*  - İlber / Dilber
* Zafer Algöz - Kenan Memedov
* Can Yılmaz - İsmail Bey
*  - Mitko Tasev
* Fevzi Gökçe - Sadık
*  - Tayanç Pakça
